current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To amend the Improper Payments Elimination and Recovery Improvement Act of 2012, including making
			 changes to the Do Not Pay initiative, for improved detection, prevention,
			 and recovery of improper payments to deceased individuals, and for other
			 purposes.

review and data
